Title: Directs the commissioner of health to establish at least 4 maternal-infant care centers in areas of need for infants suffering from drug withdrawal as a result of in utero exposure
Summary: Directs the commissioner of health to establish at least 4 maternal-infant care centers in areas of need for infants suffering from drug withdrawal as a result of in utero exposure.
LawCode: Add ยง2509-e, Pub Health L; amd ยง420, Soc Serv L; amd ยง1012, Fam Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, the social services law and the family court act, in relation to establishing the maternal-infant care centers pilot program; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
